description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Grant_HierarchyObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Grant_HierarchyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Grant_HierarchyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Reference to an existing Grant Hierarchy

Grant_Hierarchy_Data.description: Grant Hierarchy Reference ID.  This is the Grant Hierarchy unique identifier.
Boolean flag which when set to true will include the Grant Hierarchy ID in the Grant Hierarchy Name.
Boolean Flag which when set to true inactivates the Grant Hierarchy

Organization_SubtypeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Organization_SubtypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Grant_Hierarchy_Data.description: Reference to existing Grants to add as the subordinates.

validation.validation: An inactive Grant Hierarchy cannot be assigned as the superior of a Grant Hierarchy.
Superior Grant Hierarchy is not valid because it is a descendent in the existing hierarchy. Please remove the superior hierarchy or select a new one.
This Grant Hierarchy cannot be inactivated because it has active subordinates.
A hierarchy structure is defined on this organization. Please delete the hierarchy structure before assigning any superior organization.
Organization Subtype does not match the Hierarchy Structure defined on top level organization.
validation.description: Organization Subtype needs to be valid for the Hierarchy Structure on top level organization.

validation.validation: Organization Subtype is required for the Hierarchy Structure on top level organization.
A top-level hierarchy structure exists and is enforced for this parent hierarchy. Please unenforce the top-level hierarchy structure first before selecting this as a parent hierarchy.
